quizzes.question: For a member named ''mem'', select the two correct ways to print out a class member.
Type in the keyword name to store the address of the current object.

quizzes.textContent:
[h1]This[/h1]

You may be wondering why it's necessary to use the [b]this [/b]keyword, when you have the option of directly specifying the variable.

The [b]this [/b]keyword has an important role in [b]operator overloading[/b], which will be covered in the following lesson.
[note]Tap [b]Continue [/b]to learn more![/note]
